problems resulting from work with computer and non-observance of health and safety requirements:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"5.1. \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Vision problems:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"5.1.1. Eye strain caused by tension when looking at small objects. Symptoms include: eye pain, especially when doing small tasks, mingling letters and lines, double vision, watery eyes, red eyes, itching and impaired clarity of vision;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"5.1.2. “Dry eye” syndrome. When working on computer the blink rate decreases, secretion of tears reduces and open surface of eyes dries quicker leading to irritation, itching, redness and burning sensation in the eyes, desire to blink more often and tightly close the eyelids.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"5.2. \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Musculoskeletal disorders:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"5.2.1. the areas most frequently affected by musculoskeletal disorders are shoulders and neck, lumbar spine, forearm, wrist and palm;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"5.2.2. the symptoms of disorders: pain, reduced mobility, spasms, tremor, “pins and needles”, tingling sensation;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"5.2.3. the musculoskeletal system is not adapted to prolonged work in a sitting position; improperly installed workstation, uncomfortable chair and inadequate desk height exacerbate the situation. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"5.3. \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Psychosocial problems\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" (planning work intensity, duration, work and rest time and the combination of appropriate ergonomic factors in the working environment are essential for stress prevention);\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"5.4. \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Face and neck skin problems:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" itching and redness of skin;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"5.5. \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Headaches caused by:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"5.5.1. flashes and reflections on the monitor;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"5.5.2. blurred view;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"5.5.3. lenses of glasses used are not suitable for working on a computer;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"5.5.4. heavy workload, working on a computer without breaks;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"5.5.5. uncomfortable sitting position.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"III. ACTIONS OF EMPLOYEES BEFORE WORK\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"6.\\tCheck (visually) the orderliness of the office equipment, earthing, local lighting, etc. in the workplace.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"7.\\tCheck for any obstacles (wires, foreign objects, etc.) near the office equipment in use.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"8.\\tCheck that the office equipment placed on tables and shelves is stable and won’t fall.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"9.\\tDo not work on org equipment if any of its covers have been removed.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"10.\\tMake sure that no tingling is felt when touching the computer or other office equipment.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"11.\\tIf any irregularities are noticed, try to eliminate them according to the possibilities and competence, or, if this is not possible, do not start work and report to the manager.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"IV. ACTIONS OF EMPLOYEES DURING WORK\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"12.\\tDo not use electrical equipment that is in poor order (broken housing, torn insulation of wires, removed protective covers, etc.).\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"13.\\tDo not touch electrical wires without insulation and electrical contacts and do not take power supply wires with hands.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"14.\\tOffice equipment should be placed on tables and shelves in such a way that it cannot fall.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"15.\\t\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"When working with computer optimal work and rest time regime is important:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"15.1. not more than 1 hour of continuous work at visual display terminal;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"15.2. for a working day of 8 hours, a lunch break is the main break. Additional breaks of 5 (10) minutes each should be taken after 1 hour from the start of work on the visual display terminal;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"15.3. for a working day of 12 hours (working week of 40 hours) breaks for the first 8 hours should be taken in accordance with the 8-hour shift pattern, with a 15-minute break after each working hour for the remaining 4 hours.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"16.\\t\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Health and safety requirements for computer work:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"16.1. Do not to touch switches or sockets with wet hands. Clean the computer with a dry cloth;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"16.2. Do not work on the computer when electric shock is felt when touching it;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"16.3. Do not to leave the computer unattended when it is not necessary for the works being carried out or technological operations;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"16.4. Do not keep the computer and its equipment in sunlight or near heating appliances;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"16.5. Adjust the monitor so that there are no mirror reflections on the screen and the sun does not shine directly into the eyes or onto the monitor;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"16.6. The display should be clean, the view stable and images not mingled;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"16.7. Select font size when typing text so as to minimise eyestrain when reading;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"16.8. Try to display not more than three colours on the screen at one time (except for conceptual tasks, printing or drawing);\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"16.9. choose a comfortable sitting position (Fig.1), i.e.:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"16.9.1. adjust the chair so that thighs are horizontal, the feet are fully planted on the floor, the back of the chair is in contact with the back and the armrests (if the chair has them) are at elbow height;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"16.9.2. arms bent at ≥ 90 degrees with elbows close to the waist;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"16.9.3. adjust the display so that it is at eye level (when the employee sits with  back straight (except for touch screens)) and at least 40 cm from the eyes;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":150348,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/7e7ed165-ca74-4c18-b733-ab4878d35358/FI1.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/7e7ed165-ca74-4c18-b733-ab4878d35358/FI1.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"FI1.png\",\"name\":\"FI1.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"7e7ed165-ca74-4c18-b733-ab4878d35358\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":590,\"height\":509.99999999999994},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \\t\\t\\t\\t\\t\\t      \\t\\t\\t\\t\\t\\t\\t\\t\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"16.10. when typing on the keyboard, when holding the mouse, avoid bending or unnatural 'hunched' position at the wrist (Fig. 2);\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":202064,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/0fe64996-43fd-4658-b22f-befaf7983f2f/FI2.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/0fe64996-43fd-4658-b22f-befaf7983f2f/FI2.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"FI2.PNG\",\"name\":\"FI2.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"0fe64996-43fd-4658-b22f-befaf7983f2f\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":630,\"height\":485},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"16.11. do not put paper or other objects on the computer and its equipment;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"16.12. prevent small items (paperclips, clips, etc.) from entering the computer and its equipment through ventilation openings;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"16.13. use the computer only for its intended purpose, i.e. to carry out work tasks;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"16.14. before plugging an additional device (printer, scanner, etc.) into the computer socket, it is necessary to switch off the computer and the device being plugged in;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"16.15. to reduce fatigue and tension during special breaks and at the end of work, it is advisable to carry out special eye and physical exercises, to stand up and walk, and to do back exercises whenever possible.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"17.\\tIf the employee uses only a laptop in the office, the laptop should be placed on a raised platform and an additional standard keyboard should be connected (Fig. 3).\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":238595,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/41a8fe44-7066-4a4b-9c3a-ec8c5b2eb807/f3.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/41a8fe44-7066-4a4b-9c3a-ec8c5b2eb807/f3.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"f3.PNG\",\"name\":\"f3.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"41a8fe44-7066-4a4b-9c3a-ec8c5b2eb807\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":657,\"height\":519},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"18.\\tIf the employee uses the laptop outside the office, the laptop should be placed on a flat, hard surface.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"19.\\t\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"When using a printer:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"19.1. do not switch off the printer while it is printing;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"19.2. if the paper is crumpled and jammed, turn the printer off immediately;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"19.3. do not place the printer in sunlight, close to heating elements or water;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"19.4. do not touch or remove any parts of the printer;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"19.5. do not insert into the printer small pieces paper or paper of nonstandard format;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"19.6. turn off the printer immediately if smoke appears, if it does no operate normally or some liquids are spilled on it.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"20.\\t\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To avoid paper jams, the following requirements must be observed:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"20.1. keep the paper in a dry place in its original packaging. Wet paper is the main cause of paper jams and quality degradation;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"20.2. do not feed crumpled or wrinkled paper;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"20.3. after unpacking the paper (unless otherwise stated), make sure that sheets are not stuck to each other;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"20.4. do not load more paper than its maximum limits.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"21.\\t\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"When using a photocopier:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"21.1. when removing a stuck sheet of paper, switch off the photocopier and avoid touching hot parts (avoid touching the rollers);\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"21.2. avoid looking at the glass of the photocopier while copying; the original cover must be closed when copies are being made;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"21.3. use only copy paper of the right quality and appropriate standard sizes (A4, A3).\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"22.\\t\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"When using a document shredder:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"22.1. before starting work, button up and arrange your clothes so that there are no loose parts; ties, loose long hair or necklace should be pinned or secured (tied) to prevent them from getting into and being caught by the document shredder;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"22.2. observe the manufacturer’s instructions so as not to feed more (a larger bundle) or too thick paper in the shredder at one time;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"22.3. not to wipe the machine while it is in operation;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"22.4. not to pull out jammed sheets of paper while the machine is in operation;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"22.5. in the case of paper jams, unplug the machine from the mains (socket) and remove the jammed paper according to the manufacturer's recommendation;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"22.6. before placing documents in the shredder, ensure that the paper size of the documents to be shredded is no larger than the machine’s paper pick-up opening;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"22.7. insert the sheets to be shredded in accordance with the manufacturer’s instructions;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"22.8. check that the sheets to be placed in the machine for destruction are not fastened with paperclips, metal staples etc.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"23.\\tWhen using a binding machine or manual guillotine, keep hands at least 30 millimetres away from the press or cutting blade.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"24.\\tInsert only the prepared document to be laminated (covered with a special laminating film) into the laminating machine when the machine is hot enough (indicator light on).\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"25.\\tDo not stand on random objects (boxes, office chairs with wheels, etc.) in order to reach items high on shelves, etc. Use special means (ladders) for this purpose.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"26.\\tWork carefully with stapling, binding or laminating equipment. Observe the manufacturer’s requirements and do not work with defective equipment.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"27.\\tWhen pulling staples out of stapled sheets of paper, use a puller with a grip size that matches the length of the staples. Do not bend staples with your fingernails or random instruments (scissors, etc.).\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"28.\\tUse electric heaters with an open heating coil, water kettles, and coffee makers only in designated areas.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"V. ACTIONS OF EMPLOYEES IN EMERGENCY (SPECIAL) SITUATIONS\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"29.\\t\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The power must be switched off and an electrician called in the following cases:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"29.1. broken electrical wiring (a socket or plug not working, sparking);\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"29.2. smell of burning or smoke coming from the computer or its accessories;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"29.3. power outage.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"30.\\tIf metal parts of the equipment body produce electric shock, stop working, report to the manager and before moving to a safe place take measures (enclosing, posting signs and watching) to prevent others’ contact with the dangerous area.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"31.\\tIn the case of a fire, immediately unplug the computer from the mains, call the fire brigade on the general emergency number 112, start extinguishing the fire using available means, and report the fire to the manager.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"VI. ACTIONS OF EMPLOYEES AFTER WORK\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"32.\\tGet the workstation in order.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"33.\\tUnplug the computer and all other electrical equipment and appliances.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"34.\\t\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The employee who is the last to leave and lock the door (before the alarm is handed over / activated) must check that:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"34.1. windows and other openings are closed;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"34.2. there are no persons left in the premises;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"34.3. electrical equipment, lighting and other devices which must be switched off at the end of the work are switched off;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"34.4. there is no smell of burning, gas or other unusual smells.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"35.\\tReport any deficiencies and malfunctions to the works manager.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
